Plot: A chronicle of the Cristeros War (1926-1929); a war by the people of Mexico against the atheistic Mexican government.
Title: For Greater Glory: The True Story of Cristiada
Actors: Mauricio Kuri, Adrian Alonso, Rubén Blades, Catalina Sandino Moreno
tomatoConsensus: It has laudable aspirations, but For Greater Glory ultimately fails to fulfill its goals due to an overstuffed script, thinly written characters, and an overly simplified dramatization of historical events.
